= Prerequisites =

XSpec requires an XSLT 2.0 processor to [RunningXSpec run XSpec]. The batch and shell scripts assume that you'll be using Saxon, and *you must set the path to Saxon in the script*.

If you want to validate your XSpec description documents, you'll need a [http://relaxng.org/#validators RELAX NG validator].
